Description: Sandal, one of a pair (see big.no = 71905) made of palm fibre, left foot. One-under-one plait, two thicknesses of fibre hence flimsy. Rear end folded over but not properly continued, tied off to left. Fragment of front tie survives, twisted palm fibre.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), unit 763 room 8 west end floor l floor 2
Curator's comments: Original photograph AN405602001 taken by Adrianus t'Hooft and copyright assigned to the Museum
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
